item.description:
Thank you to Becky Hernandez for pointing out this great meetup idea!

Dr. Seuss Storytelling Time
Target Store
125 Buckland Hills Drive, South Windsor
(860) 327-0082
(near the Buckland Hills Mall)

Becky says: If anyone is interested this Saturday 2/27/10 at Target in Manchester they are having a Dr. Seuss Storytelling Time between 9am-11am. It is FREE and they will have snacks, games and giveaways! I will be going with my daughter if you are interested in meeting let me know!

I called the store and spoke to Jennifer. She said that this is an Annual event for every Target store! Dr. Seuss' birthday is March 2nd, so they always do this event on this weekend. All Ages are welcome, and there will be something for every child to do.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Becky Hernandez in the storytelling area.

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Dr. Seuss Storytelling Time! FREE
